src:
Aubrey at Troy gusto nang magpakasal
05 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Aster Amoyo
APAT na ang anak ng dating sexy star na si Aubrey Miles, isa sa dati nitong naka-relasyon na si JP Obligacion na si John Maurie Obligacion  (18) at tatlo sa kanyang longtime partner na si Troy Montero  na sina Hunter Cody Miller, Rocket Miller at new baby girl.
Kahit 17 years na ang relasyon ng mag-partner na Aubrey at Troy at never na nagpakasal ang dalawa kaya ngayon ay iniisip na nila itong gawin pero hindi sa Pilipinas kundi malamang sa Peru.
Ayon kay Aubrey, wala na umano silang dapat patunayan ni Troy pagdating sa kanilang relasyon pero ang plano nilang pagpapakasal ay hindi na umano para sa kanilang dalawa kundi sa kanilang mga anak.  Talo pa si Troy ng kanyang nakababatang kapatid na si KC Montero na dalawang beses nang nagpakasal.  Una sa singer-actress na si Geneva Cruz at nito lamang October sa kanyang bagong wife, ang dating beauty queen na si Stephanie Dods.
text:
Aubrey and Troy want to get married
05 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Aster Amoyo
The son of former sexy star Aubrey Miles, one of JP Obligacion's former friends, John Maurie Obligacion (18) and three of his longtime partner Troy Montero's Hunter Cody Miller, Rocket Miller, and new baby girl.
Although Aubrey and Troy have been dating for 17 years and the two have never been married, they are now considering doing so not only in the Philippines but probably in Peru.
According to Aubrey, Troy has nothing to prove when it comes to their relationship but their marriage plans are no longer for the two of them but for their children. Troy is survived by his younger brother KC Montero who has been married twice. First up is singer-actress Geneva Cruz and just this October with her new wife, former beauty queen Stephanie Dods.
